Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Mucopolysaccharidosis IVA ( MPS IVA ) is an autosomal recessive lysosomal storage disorder caused by a genetic defect in N - acetylgalactosamine - 6 - sulfate sulfatase ( GALNS ) .

1. Mucopolysaccharidosis IVA (MPS IVA)
2. Autosomal recessive lysosomal storage disorder
3. Genetic defect
4. N - acetylgalactosamine - 6 - sulfate sulfatase (GALNS) deficiency

These are the disease entities mentioned in the paragraph. MPS IVA is a specific type of lysosomal storage disorder caused by a genetic defect in the GALNS enzyme.
